content: this pattern is revised for our makers league february project if you received a hard copy pattern in your kit please download a new pattern there is a mistake in row 1 of the earflap decrease row 1 should read row 1 k2tog x2 *k1 k1 below repeat from * until 4 sts remain k2tog x2 this hat will help keep you warm during the polar vortex we are having *again* in minnesota with the winter we ve had we deserve a super squishy warm hat this hat pattern has a fun honeycomb patterned brim and earflaps with pom poms and twisted tails we no longer carry this yarn at the shop but 230 -250 yards of any worsted weight will work lovely this pattern is designed for the darn knit anyway s darn yarn club february 2014
